member.name: T:Rebus.Log4Net.Log4NetLoggerFactory
member.summary: Implementation of that creates loggers that log their stuff using Log4net

member.name: M:Rebus.Log4Net.Log4NetLoggerFactory.GetLogger(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a logger for the specified type - will delegate the call to Log4Net's log manager

member.name: T:Rebus.Log4Net.Log4NetLoggingExtension
member.summary: Extensions to that allows for choosing Log4net for all of Rebus' internal logging needs

member.name: F:Rebus.Log4Net.Log4NetLoggingExtension.DefaultCorrelationIdPropertyKey
member.summary: Default Log4Net thread context key to use for setting the correlation ID of the message currently being handled.

member.name: M:Rebus.Log4Net.Log4NetLoggingExtension.Log4Net(Rebus.Configuration.LoggingConfigurer)
member.summary: Configures Rebus to use Log4net for all of its internal logging. Will automatically add a 'CorrelationId' variable to the Log4Net thread context when handling messages, allowing log output to include that.

member.name: M:Rebus.Log4Net.Log4NetLoggingExtension.Log4Net(Rebus.Configuration.LoggingConfigurer,System.String)
member.summary: Configures Rebus to use Log4net for all of its internal logging. Will automatically add a correlation ID variable to the Log4Net thread context under the key specified by when handling messages, allowing log output to include that.
